price: Allah kimə hidayət bəxş edərsə, doğru yolda olan odur. Kimləri də azdırırsa, ziyana uğrayanlar da elə məhz onlardır.
arabic: مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِيۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadī waman yuḍ'lil fa-ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
